title: SFR10
author: SFR10
content: What happened: While I was browsing the Goods board earlier, I noticed there's a user that claims his/her software can generate a ridiculous amount of Bitcoin and upon checking one of his/her other threads, it became worse!Scammers Profile Link: Bucksoftware101Reference Link: - Selling Bitcoin SmartGen – Premium Version 2023 - Exclusive Lifetime Access [archived]Quote from: Bucksoftware101 on April 09, 2023, 12:21:34 AMBitcoin SmartGen is computer software for generating Bitcoin by exploiting flaws in the Bitcoin network. Integrated with a powerful hacking script, this software can generate up to 100 BTC per day on any type of wallet with a full 3/3 confirmation and you had the option of making your transaction completely anonymous. The RBF option as well as the setting of Proxy are also possible.I can help you setup the system through team viewer or you follow the video guide i'll add to the package. I give full refund if you do not get positive result.~Snipped~- Selling Meta Bitcoin Injector Software - 2023 Updated Version [archived]Quote from: Bucksoftware101 on April 09, 2023, 12:34:38 AMMeta Bitcoin Injector is a software that exploits the flaws of the bitcoin network using a powerful integrated computer script that allows it to generate a maximum of 300 Bitcoin per injection. It ensures a full confirmation of the transaction and generates the Bitcoin on any type of wallet and any type of addresses. The transaction can be completely anonymous. With this software, you can also generate Bitcoins on several cryptocurrency exchangers.~Snipped~Tagged and "created a flag".

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: The nerve of this guy for selling something like that here obviously this guy is a scammer he did not mention escrow because he is selling a dream and if this software of his really works then why he is selling it, he can easily make endless money.Quotegenerating Bitcoin by exploiting flaws in the Bitcoin network stuff like this never existed and will not exist in the network, the guy is selling a dream that he can hack any wallet, if he really can do this he should have first done it on Satoshi Nakamoto's wallet.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on April 17, 2023, 08:57:02 PMThe nerve of this guy for selling something like that here obviously this guy is a scammer he did not mention escrow because he is selling a dream and if this software of his really works then why he is selling it, he can easily make endless money.How do we know that he doesn't already run several sites using this script? in order for such a site to become "profitable", and to reach investors, it is necessary to invest a lot in marketing. Reselling script maybe it will bring less profit, but it also requires less investment in promotion.We are fighting here against such scam producers but unfortunately, I have seen similar scripts being sold on some very reputable platforms like Codecanon.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: He is not only a scammer but an hacker as well. Those innocent people who pay him for the script will lose their money, their account details, and credit card details. I don't know how could people do such things without any shame, everyone should be careful from such scammers. I think he's probably selling this script on many forums and social media groups, and there will be many innocent people who will pay this guy by falling in the trap. They will lose money, their account details, their credit cards details as well as their personal files.Such people have no morals and they can misuse those details to defame others. I suggest everyone to be careful from this user, also from others calming such things. It's impossible to generate 100 Bitcoin with such fake scripts. How could a script generate $3 million worth of coins a day? Anyone with commonsense knows that such kind of claims are not but scams to trap innocent people.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: There are two things that Bucksoftware101 is probably trying to do;Either;1. He is selling to people air there by scamming them off their money2. He is selling people scripts that are actually malicious. Once the user installs or runs the scripts, their devices get infectedI am leaning more to the latter.Here is the YouTube channel of the fake script - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1tYPkqXW0GY

comments.author: CryptoGrizzly
comments.body: Bucksoftware101 created 10 videos within the past day https://www.youtube.com/@MetaBitcoinWorld/videosAll scams!

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: I have read his previous posts that he is desperate to get any money for fraud, so he tries to sell software, and once he tries to sell real estate, and other dreams that are too good to be true.This type of scam is easy to detect, but with people who believe that there is a way to double your money by simply sending it to a scammer I am afraid that some people will fall victim to such fraud.Flag supported

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on April 17, 2023, 08:57:02 PMif he really can do this he should have first done it on Satoshi Nakamoto's wallet.Judging by the content of the above two threads, I wouldn't be surprised to see him/her making a comment here to claim he/she is actually the creator/inventor Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on April 17, 2023, 11:31:56 PMHere is the YouTube channel of the fake script - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1tYPkqXW0GYThank you for the video... To newcomers who might think it works, it doesn't [see how he/she didn't show from where that address was taken (clearly it's not a fresh address)]!Quote from: CryptoGrizzly on April 17, 2023, 11:47:26 PMBucksoftware101 created 10 videos within the past day https://www.youtube.com/@MetaBitcoinWorld/videosAll scams!Exactly... I checked another one of his/her fake videos and it clearly says "SPOOF SUCCESSFUL(OK)" on a couple of occasions [1:33 and 2:04] while there's also a mention of "SPOOFING PACKETS THROUGH IPV6 TUNNEL [1:38] and at the end, it's asking users to send mining fees to complete the so-called "generation process [2:38]"!- It's worth noting that the address on this video doesn't have 0.5BTC as part of its received transactions: bc1q0w9q24y03nh6fpkp909227y5t7h60n5284lj2kQuote from: Husires on April 18, 2023, 04:57:16 AMThis type of scam is easy to detect, but with people who believe that there is a way to double your money by simply sending it to a scammer I am afraid that some people will fall victim to such fraud.I agree... As long as greedy people exist, they're not going to have a hard time finding victims [unfortunately].Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on April 17, 2023, 11:31:56 PM2. He is selling people scripts that are actually malicious. Once the user installs or runs the scripts, their devices get infectedI am leaning more to the latter.Quote from: ETFbitcoin on April 18, 2023, 09:48:01 AMIn addition, there's risk his fake software and support (when he said "I can help you setup the system through team viewer") could take over victim's device and steal valuable data inside it.Unfortunately, there's a high chance for both of these things to happen

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: Flag supported. I also reported his YouTube channel since it clearly breaches youtube's terms of use.I hope it will be taken down soon while its videos still have a small number of views although I doubt there are still people who may fall for such kind of scams!  You don't need to be a genuine to realize that all he says doesn't make any sense.
